ygData.subject: Re: Adventure vacations levels 12-15 *spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I m going to have to ask for even more spoiler. :)  I ve been to Kithicor a couple of times, and besides some ruins (stonehenge kind) having some rather
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I'm going to have to ask for even more spoiler. :) I've been to
Kithicor a couple of times, and besides some ruins (stonehenge kind) having
some rather easy (for a lvl 14 druid, and lvl 14 cleric) mummies and green
skels, and occasional green skels that pop up around the lake, we haven't
been able to find any more critters worth beating up on. A few blue spiders
or snakes (can't remember exactly), few & far between.

So what good IS Kithicor? I'm not being a smartass or sarcastic, I'd really
like to know. Please give me some ideas WHERE is good in there.

----- Original Message -----
From: Symber Ash <symber1@...>

> >From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
> >everything Kithicor (ALWAYS a good bet for mysterious adventure, there is
a
> bizarre hidden
> >story in that woods, over on Crossroads of Norath/Discussions we have a
> little Kithicor fan club....
>
>
> Finally someone else notices...I get sick of those messages that say
> something like, "We need to get rid of useless zones....like Kithicor"
>
> I adventured there for more than a few levels, and I still get a kick out
of
> that dark place...Have you ever met Kithicor himself? I saw him once by
the
> cabin with the grizzley bears and the flag. He didn't say much...
>
> Ryndal
> Level 18 Bard
> Cazic-Thule
>
>
